sentences.en: " The Seventh - Year Long Term " appeared on the board above the platform.
sentences.cn: 台上那揭示板旋出了“七年长期公债本月期 ” 来.

sentences.en: " The twenty - seventh is the old man's birthday. You must come. "
sentences.cn: “ 赶到 二十七 呀,老头子的生日, 你得来一趟. ”

sentences.en: A million people died, a seventh of the population.
sentences.cn: 共有100万人丧生，占总人口的七分之一。

sentences.en: Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.cn: 圣灰星期三，大斋首日：复活节前第七个星期三和大斋期的第一天，在这一天很多基督教都用灰在前额画一标记以作忏悔和必死的标志。

sentences.en: Both will meet in your seventh house of partnerships, so to unlock your good fortune, you need to collaborate with a partner.
sentences.cn: 它们将在你表合作关系的第七宫会面，如果你有一个合作伙伴的话，它们将合作释放出你的好运气。

sentences.en: God blessed the seventh day, and made it holy.
sentences.cn: 上帝赐福第七天, 把它定为圣日.

sentences.en: Grint added that he would "definitely" like to be part of the sixth and seventh films.
sentences.cn: 格林特还补充说他肯定还会参加第六和第七部哈�波特电影的拍摄。

sentences.en: He knew how the traffic congested at the junction of Seventh Avenue and Forty - second Street.
sentences.cn: 他知道在第7街和第42街交叉处交通是多么拥挤.

sentences.en: He was knocked out in the seventh round.
sentences.cn: 他在第七回合被打晕了.

sentences.en: I was the seventh child in a family of 11.
sentences.cn: 我在家里的11个孩子中排行老七。

sentences.en: In seventh grade Mark went out for three sports but was rather poor in two of them.
sentences.cn: 马克在7年级的时候参加了3个运动项目，但是其中两项他都表现得实力不济。

sentences.en: July is the seventh month of the year.
sentences.cn: 7月是一年中的第七个月.

sentences.en: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.cn: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

sentences.en: Nicholas Paul Patrick was seventh in the line of succession to the throne.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉斯·保罗·帕特里克是王位的第七顺位继承人。

sentences.en: On the seventh day of Christmas.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节的第七天。

sentences.en: She is now seventh in line of succession to the throne.
sentences.cn: 她目前是王位的第七顺位继承人。

sentences.en: She was in the seventh heaven of rapture.
sentences.cn: 她欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: That hateful twenty - seventh still preyed on his mind.
sentences.cn: 还是没办法,还是得为那个可恨的二十七发愁.

sentences.en: The play is open to all seventh and eighth graders.
sentences.cn: 所有七、八年级的学生均可观看此剧。

sentences.en: This is the seventh year that he has worked the streets of Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 这是他在曼哈顿街头献艺的第7个年头。

words.tran_cn: 第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的
第七十的；七十分之一的

trans.tran_en: coming after six other things in a series

trans.tran_cn: 第七（个），七分之一，[乐]七度音程
trans.tran_en: one of seven equal parts of something
one of seven equal parts of something
